medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient complained of right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain starting at 12am that improves when lying flat on her back and avoiding movement. She also endorses nausea, loss of appetite, and bloating. Her last menstrual period was 1 week ago, and she had a bowel movement earlier today. She denies fever, chills, vomiting, changes in bowel or bladder habits.
